summary:
Two stone statues that Malo created for his mod
Ruf nach Folkwang http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25640/?
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

==============
Malo Statues
==============

by Malo (Kalten1979)



Modder's resource


Two stone statues that Malo created for his mod "Ruf nach Folkwang"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25640/?

I asked him to upload these statues as modders resources. He gave his permission for the upload but he passed this task over to me :D

All credits go to Malo, I did nothing else but upload the file.

Please give Kudos to Malo and check out his other mods.
His username on the Nexus is Kalten1979 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/461029/?tb=mods&pUp=1


==============
Permissions
==============

This is a modder's resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit to Malo as the creator of the resource and you do not charge money for it.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites
author: Malo
